definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The tea plant ( Camellia sinensis ); ( countable ) a variety of this plant .
examples: Darjeeling tea is grown in India.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The dried leaves or buds of the tea plant ; ( countable ) a variety of such leaves .
examples: Go to the supermarket and buy some Darjeeling tea .
Not for all the tea in China .

definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The drink made by infusing these dried leaves or buds in hot water .
examples: She is drinking her tea right now.

definitions.definition: Any drink which is similar to Camellia sinensis tea in some way:

subdefinitions.definition: ( uncountable ) Any similar drink made by infusing parts of various other plants .
( uncountable , in combination ) Meat stock served as a hot drink .

definitions.definition: ( countable , Commonwealth , northern US ) A cup or ( East Asia , Southern US ) glass of any of these drinks , often with milk , sugar , lemon , and/or tapioca pearls .
examples: We'd like one tea and one coffee, please.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable , UK ) A light midafternoon meal , typically but not necessarily including tea.
examples: I won't make it to the breakfast event, but I'll see you at the tea .

definitions.definition: ( uncountable , Commonwealth , Ireland ) Synonym of supper , the main evening meal, whether or not it includes tea.
examples: The family were sitting round the table, eating their tea .

definitions.definition: ( cricket ) The break in play between the second and third sessions .
examples: Australia were 490 for 7 at tea on the second day.

definitions.definition: ( slang , especially gay slang and African-American Vernacular ) Information , especially gossip .
examples: Spill the tea on that drama, hon.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The tea plant ( Camellia sinensis ); ( countable ) a variety of this plant .

definitions.definition: A moment , a historical unit of time from China, about the amount of time needed to quickly drink a traditional cup of tea. It is now found in Chinese-language historical fiction.

main_definition: A moment , a historical unit of time from China, about the amount of time needed to quickly drink a traditional cup of tea. It is now found in Chinese-language historical fiction.
